mapper.sql: CTTId, Year, Place, ClCode, ClName, CTTax
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_classtraveltax where year=#{0} and place=#{1}
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_classtraveltax
CTTId,
Year,
Place,
ClCode,
ClName,
CTTax,

mapper.update:
update tbl_classtraveltax
Year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ClCode = #{clcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ClName = #{clname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTTax = #{cttax,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where CTTId = #{cttid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tbl_classtraveltax set Year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ClCode = #{clcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ClName = #{clname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTTax = #{cttax,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where CTTId = #{cttid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
